description: The United Nations Group of Experts on Geographical Names (UNGEGN) has verified the names the names, coordinates, and locations of islands owned by Indonesia. With climate change and various nature irregularities, several islands have emerged, while several other islands have disappeared due to abrasion. The verification of islands and their names continued to be done in order to ensure Indonesiaâ€™s geographical certainty.
name: Islands Verified by the United Nations
